column1: Little Goat Diner////And the food was very good
column2: indeed. My fave was Fat Elvis waffles with peanut butter butter and bacon maple syrup -- I am sure this is how The King wanted to be remembered. Running a close second was Dark Chocolate Chip Crunch pancakes with chocolate malt butter. If your idea of a great brunch is sweet indulgence
column3: pick either of these two. We also had a Parathas Burrito
